description:
The MPG Vital Nursing Maternity Tank Top is a tank top that is designed for pregnant and nursing women who want to stay active and comfortable. You can wear this tank top for yoga, walking, or lounging around the house.

  • This tank top is made of a soft and stretchy fabric that can adapt to your changing body and provide moisture-wicking and breathability
  • It has a built-in bra that offers light support and easy access for nursing or skin-to-skin contact with your baby
  • It has adjustable straps, a scoop neck, and a curved hem that flatter your figure
name: MPG Vital Nursing Maternity Tank Top - Women's
